name: Pocket Network (POKT)
description: Pocket Network is a decentralized infrastructure protocol for developers who want to build peer-to-peer applications that are secure, scalable, and private. Pocket Network aims to provide blockchain agnostic solutions, allowing developers to interact with any blockchain without the need to run their own nodes. Pocket Network incentivizes node operators to provide decentralized API services through a native cryptocurrency, ensuring the reliability and resilience of blockchain applications.
